thread.title: USA v Japan: World Baseball Classic semi-final – live! | Sport
thread.title_full: USA v Japan: World Baseball Classic semi-final – live! | Sport | The Guardian

author: Bryan Armen Graham
title: USA v Japan: World Baseball Classic semi-final – live! | Sport
text:
The United States and Japan meet at Dodger Stadium for a place in Wednesday’s WBC championship game. Photograph: Kelvin Kuo/USA Today Sports Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share via Email View more sharing options Share on LinkedIn Share on Pinterest Share on Google+ Share on WhatsApp Share on Messenger Close Bryan Armen Graham 
@bryanagraham Wednesday 22 March 2017 00.03 GMT First published on Wednesday 22 March 2017 00.01 GMT 
Key events Show 12.00am GMT 00:00 Tonight's starting lineups Live feed Show 12.00am GMT 00:00 
Tonight's starting lineups Bryan will be here shortly. In the meantime, here’s a look at tonight’s lineups.
Japan Tetsuto Yamada, DH Ryosuke Kikuchi, 2B Norichika Aoki, RF Yoshitomo Tsutsugoh, LF Sho Nakata, 1B Hayato Sakamoto, SS Nobuhiro Matsuda, 3B Shogo Aiyama, CF Seiji Kobayashi, C RHP Tomoyuki Sugano
United States Ian Kinsler, 2B Adam Jones, CF Christian Yelich, LF Nolan Arenado, 3B Eric Hosmer, 1B Andrew Mccutcheon, RF Buster Posey, C Giancarlo Stanton, DH Brandon Crawford, SS RHP Tanner Roark
Updated at 12.03am GMT
